storyInfo: The enemy quickly routs the mercenaries, and Ines, upon waking up, is forced to fight alongside W. Ines pretends to abandon W to ambush their pursuers, but they are still surrounded by powerful enemies.

attributes.content: To the north of Kazdel lies a birch forest.
There, the progression of life unfolds. From Spring it begins, and in Winter it ceases.
And only death thrives in the long winters. All living things make their exodus in unison, leaving only the Originium crystals speckled along the ground to reflect the somber moonlight.
...Pale, withered tree trunks hang lifelessly, their slender shadows intertwining and stacking upon empty expanses of snow.
That is the scenery I saw.
...Ines!
...Ines! Tch!
...Screw you!
If you're not dead yet, then wake up already.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Huh...?
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: (My head... what is this pain...?)
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: What's going on... what happened?
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: Nothing happened, but just in case that fall gave you amnesia, I'll give you a quick summary.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: We were ambushed an hour ago. They were quick. Our caster had no time to put up a barrier, and our team got split up. We're the only ones here.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: And the comms?
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: Jammed. I don't know how they're doing it, but we're definitely up against pros. At least more professional than any of our prey before.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: But the good news is they didn't go straight for the convoy. Looks like they got a tip or something, but not the details.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: ...Go ahead. Find a way to meet up with the others.
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: Oh? I figured you'd doubt me, at least a little.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Guess I'll leave you as bait.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Who do you think would survive if we fought?
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: Obviously—
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Tsk... You really should do something about that nasty personality of yours. You can tell I'm injured that easy?
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Oh... so it hurts that bad, huh?
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: I figured you had some control over your emotions, like you could fake them. Guess I was being more careful than I needed to be.
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: Do you always scan your teammates with Arts as soon as you wake up? Now that's a mark of trust, boss.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Force of habit.
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: So that's why, huh? The first thing you do after you open your eyes is surveil your surroundings. What a coward~
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Hey! That hurts...!
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: You said bait, right? Not a bad idea.
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: No point in dragging along a merc who can't even stand up straight. You stay here for a sec and I'll call in the enemy.
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: Hope you guys get along nicely. Can't have you dying on me too quickly.
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: See you later, W.
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: Oh, one last thing. I never trusted you.
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: Hey, you little—!
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: ...I found a mercenary. Just one.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: Confirmation. It's W.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: ...That was fast.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Or rather, you've been following us the whole time, huh...?
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Letting a few of them go was well worth it if it means we can get our hands on an HVT like you.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: Hmph. I was gonna follow you back to the rest of your team. Never expected them to just abandon one of their own.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: Tell me everything you know about them and you might get a quick death.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: Well there's the trouble, huh? ...I'd love for us to be honest with each other, but the truth is that I don't know anything.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: You're badly wounded. And we don't have time to waste. You might die if we torture you on the spot, and I'm sure nobody wants that.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: In that case, you should chase down that woman. She knows more than I do.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: ...Don't you resent her for using you as bait?
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: You'll have a better time if you work with us.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: ...Bait, huh?
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Say... Have you ever baited Originium slugs with industrial residue before?
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: ...What are you talking about?
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: It's kind of a Kazdel folk thing. We get Originium slug infestations, you know?
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Wild Originium slugs are pretty dumb, and they like Originium—
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: —But setting that aside, do you know what happens to the poor slugs that are lured over?
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Don't mince words with—
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: They get blown apart, just like your buddies over there.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: What?! When did you...?!
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: Hey, you even said I was bait. Didn't you think that meant a trap?
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Probably should've killed me sooner, or ran off, I guess. Here, I'll give you another chance. Let's take it from the top.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: *cough* *cough*——
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: —So fast?! Have you been chasing us this whole time?
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: You're insane!!
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: Ugh... Who's... behind...
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: Hush. No sudden movements.
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: It's kind of a beginner sword, but I'm not so good with a blade. If my hand slips, you die.
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: When— When did you get—
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: I'm pretty close with the shadows. Did you really think you'd be able to catch me without a scout?
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: Speak up. Who's your master?
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: I'll... never—
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: Graaaaahhh!!
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: Easy there. How's a guy supposed to talk if you turn his organs to mush?
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Kazdel will... never... forgive you...
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: (Kazdel...)
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: Mm, thank you.
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: You really suck at torture.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: ...Damn. You're still alive.
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: You could've let him kill me first. Too bad you're so impatient.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Hmph. Of course I'd rather kill them first. These insects have taken too much from us.
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: When the enemy shows you an opening, any merc worth her salt would kill him, no?
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: ...Hah.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: You really do have a bit of Sarkaz in you, huh?
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Rubbed off on me.
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: That wasn't exactly quiet. I bet more of them are on the way.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Isn't that what we want? Keep them away from the objective.
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: He said he let a couple get away... That means the rest are dead.
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: He wasn't good enough to take down that many of our people. And he was definitely scared. There's... something else out here.
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: Whew.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: ...Were you really faking your injury?
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: No no, you can't just fake an open wound away.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: This is all mind over matter.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: But let's talk about you. Did you really know that I had a present ready for them as soon as you woke up?
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: If I didn't wake up, I would've been the bait.
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: I definitely would've waited for you to die before springing the trap.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Hmph...
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: If one day, you meet someone who actually could read your mind...
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: You won't be a match for her.
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: I guess I'll cross that bridge when I come to it.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Can you feel around with Arts?
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: ...As if I wasn't going to do that already.
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: No...
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: That's the look that usually means we're boned.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: You got that right.
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: But there's no running now. We press on.
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: And you suck at fighting, so it's all up to me?
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Head west. We might be able to turn this around with Hoederer and his team.
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: And if we can't find them?
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Then we die.
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: We wiped out half the escort team, but we couldn't stop the convoy before point A5.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior?

attributes.content: They threw out a lot of decoys. Some of the most well-guarded ones were fakes.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior?

attributes.content: Either Babel's pulling some next-level strats, or... the real one doesn't even need protection.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior?

attributes.content: Yeah, we need to end this fast.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior?

attributes.content: Thought we could leave mop-up operations to those scum... Didn't think they'd blow that too.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior?

attributes.content: Their skills are all over the place. Hoederer's team was a lot tougher than I thought.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior?

attributes.content: If Babel didn't score them first, would've been nice to get them for ourselves.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior?

attributes.content: Do we keep chasing?
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior?

attributes.content: We don't know what's up ahead.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior?

attributes.content: Understood, General.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior?

attributes.content: We lost them?
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: Split up. You go east, I'll take the west.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: Phew... phew...
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: These guys aren't easy marks.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Duh. Hide.
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: Pfah...
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: Knock it off. You've been at it since the beginning. You're gonna go blind. Don't your eyes hurt?
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Of course they hurt, dumbass. But we have to find a way out...
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: Aieeeeee! I surrender!
attributes.name: Mercenary

attributes.content: Ooh, what a nice, clean slash. Did you see that?
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: They're dressed up as mercs, but these aren't mercs.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Cut the chatter!
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: They don't even need to ambush us. They could take us head on in the ruins and we wouldn't be able to beat them.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: What are you thinking?
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: Huh...
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Are you still spying on me? At a time like this?
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: No. I just haven't gone blind yet.
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: You've got so many... are those grenades? What are you doing?
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: Are you gonna blow yourself up with them?
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: A kill's a kill, no?
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Don't throw your life away for nothing.
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: For what then?
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: What's the point of living? What should I throw my life away for?
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: ...Sarkaz really are crazy.
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: That's why I never trusted you. You're not crazy.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Hey, W! Wait!
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: Gah, come back!
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: Yep. Found one. The one and only W.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: The way you toss those Originium grenades around, and such big ones too. That's the kind of crazy that gets my blood pumping.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: How do you do it? All my friends incinerated in a flash, and don't have a scratch on you?
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: What can I say? Practice makes perfect.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: The General's gonna like you.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: Just lay it all out for me. What's Babel got you doing? You can do a lot better somewhere else.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: Why should you trust me?
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Why should I trust you?
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Asking the right questions in the right order.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: Mercenaries are a tool of war. If we're gonna fight, we gotta have the right tools at hand.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: Don't you think we're more expendable than that?
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: That's your call.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: We got another one hiding 17 meters out, 4 o'clock. The one with the scouting arts. You can think it over too.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: Put the sword down. You can't beat me. Welcome to try though.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: Hmph...
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: What do you want?
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: Yeah... this fits. We got W and Ines.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: You got maybe 20% of your people left. The scattered remnants can't do much.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: What's that you're standing on...?
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: Oh? This?
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: It used to be a person. I guess it's hard to tell at this point.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: You get it now? We're not your regular mercenaries. We're not hitmen either.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: What if we do this? There's the two of you, plus your leader. Only one of you three has to die.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: The other two bring back a head. I don't care whose. We pin all the losses on the head and take in the survivors.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: Not that this is my call. But we have to do something for our fallen men.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: Things could've gone a different way if we weren't meeting on the battlefield.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: That's awful nice of you.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Just my luck. I suck at fighting. I probably can't beat this ugly bitch.
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: Now we're so honest all of a sudden.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Yeah, so the only other choice is for us to team up and kill Hoederer.
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: Yep. Hoederer.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: So——
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: Hm...
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: Tell me... why do mercenaries insist on getting killed?
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: I'm not gonna stay on the side that's getting played. I'd much rather play with someone else's life.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Plus, I'm real sick of listening to you. You're boring. And your shitty little attempt at a death game sucks.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Oh, and my poor little lamb here steadily going blind...
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: She's not Sarkaz. You noticed, right? You stepped right into her minefield.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: You know how this will end. You've already lost.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: Oh?
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: I dunno about that one...
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Are you really going? The landship is right here.
Yes, I didn't expect them to spot it so soon. Did intel blow this one?
At least we've got the mercenaries.
We put them in danger. They have no idea what's happening.
They're mercenaries. They live for this. And sooner or later... it will be our burden too.
I can save them. I can save some of the men who would die for our mistakes.
You're right, Theresa, but...
There isn't a single Sarkaz, not a single person, who should die for nothing.
...*Sigh*... Then I'm coming with you.
Good. Thank you——
——Kal'tsit.
Wow, reinforcements, huh...? Who are they...?
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: There's a lot of them...
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Hey, you stay with me.
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: Sorry... I'm just so... sleepy...
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Since when do you know the word 'sorry?'
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: I had to watch you pass out last time... Now it's your turn...
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: C'mon, be a team player... I just need a little... nap...
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Tch.
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: Fourteen, fifteen... Still more...
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: They're professionals. Look how they move... they know the battlefield even better than we do...
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: ...Kazdel... hmph...
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: Ine... Come in... someone...
Going... to save you...
Comms are back...?
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: What... what's this feeling...?
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: Someone's close...!
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: ...Hoederer.
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: Ines! Where's W? What are your coordinates?
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: You lived in Kazdel... before the war... didn't you?
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: There's something I have to ask...
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: Are you wounded? Catch your breath.
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: Find a safe place to hide. The convoy is going to call in reinforcements for us...
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: Just... listen to me, Hoederer.
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: Okay, I'm listening.
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: The King of Sarkaz... The one who lost Kazdel... Her Majesty...
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: Is she... a woman with white hair?
attributes.name: Ines
